alert.note: Alert for North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 3:29AM PST until December 26 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MONDAY EVENING TO 1 AM PST TUESDAY NEAR BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected near beaches and headlands. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could result in tree damage and scattered power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
